subtasks.title: Collect customer data from surveys, social media, and website analytics
subtasks.description: Gather quantitative and qualitative data about customer preferences, pain points, and behavior through surveys, social listening tools, and website analytics platforms.

subtasks.title: Analyze data to identify customer preferences and behavior patterns
subtasks.description: Process collected data to extract actionable insights about audience segments, content preferences, and engagement trends.

subtasks.title: Brainstorm content topics aligned with customer insights
subtasks.description: Generate a list of blog, video, and social post topics that address identified customer needs and interests.

subtasks.title: Create blog content based on prioritized topics
subtasks.description: Write and edit blog posts optimized for SEO and audience engagement, incorporating customer insights.

subtasks.title: Produce video content aligned with audience preferences
subtasks.description: Script, film, and edit videos addressing customer pain points or demonstrating product value.

subtasks.title: Design social media posts for multiple platforms
subtasks.description: Create platform-specific social content (text, images, hashtags) tailored to audience engagement patterns.

subtasks.title: Develop content calendar for cross-channel distribution
subtasks.description: Schedule blogs, videos, and social posts across platforms using a coordinated publishing timeline.

subtasks.title: Implement tracking via UTM parameters and analytics tools
subtasks.description: Set up Google Analytics, social platform insights, and UTM-tagged links to monitor content performance.

subtasks.title: Monitor engagement metrics in real-time
subtasks.description: Track likes, shares, comments, bounce rates, and time-on-page metrics daily to assess content resonance.

subtasks.title: Track conversion metrics linked to sales targets
subtasks.description: Measure form completions, email signups, product purchases, and other KPIs tied to revenue goals.

subtasks.title: Generate weekly performance reports
subtasks.description: Compile engagement and conversion data into actionable reports highlighting top-performing content.

subtasks.title: Optimize content strategy based on data insights
subtasks.description: Adjust topics, formats, and distribution channels using performance data to improve engagement and conversions.
